name: Exodus Initiative Early Blueprint Package
desc: Detailed schematic drawings and digitized scans that collectively allow heavy industry to produce the curiously labeled 'Initiative 1' Hulls used by the Anarakis Reparations Society. Many of the materials contained within are physical in nature and are annotated in strange terminology, much to the dismay of factory foremen everywhere.

name: Monogram Shredder Blueprint Package
desc: Detailed schematic drawings and digitized scans that collectively allow heavy industry to produce the 'Mk2 Bigram Railgun' Many of the materials contained within are physical in nature and are annotated in strange terminology, much to the dismay of factory foremen everywhere.

name: Warpshot Repeater Hacked Production Chip
desc: A thorough hack job, what was once a production chip containing common baseline blueprints has been extensively reconfigured to read and translate data from an unknown source into something more readily usable. This has allowed it to produce something labeled as a Warpshot Repeater, provided one is willing to ignore the bevy of diagnostic warnings that pop up when this chip is plugged in. The level of firmware modifications that had to be made to make this possible have irrevocably bricked the chip for all other uses.
